channel.title: The main reason this site is so spammy, and what you can do about it
channel.description:
Look, when you're put in the position of a mod, and you read post reports on a daily basis, it becomes blatently obvious why this site is so full of crap. It's because, when someone breaks a rule, 10 million people jump on it immediately, quote it, and scream random cusswords at him.
Guess what folks, you are just making more spam for us to clear up and other people to burn their eyes on.
Most people are using the post report system a lot now, which is great. But once you've reported it, do not reply. If you must reply, at least make it a calm, sensible reply, explaining what the original poster has done wrong.
Moparscape as a whole will thank you for it.
MOPARSCAPE MODS: I hope I didn't tread on your turf creating a sticky here - I don't plan on keeping it long, just until it's been read a bit, then I'll delete it.

item.title: The main reason this site is so spammy, and what you can do about it
item.dc:creator: @Sin2 Sin_
item.description:
@Sin2 wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:3, topic:149032”]A few down. About 30 more inquisitive idiots to go.

Before quoting me and flaming. Look at the picture of the year:
[/quote]

I will quote. People are not idiots, they are just “ignorant” in what they do, it doesn’t make them an idiot. Just by calling them that, you’re just as bad as flamming someone.

Read full topic

item.title: The main reason this site is so spammy, and what you can do about it
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

[quote=“jua, post:66, topic:149032”][quote author=hippie link=topic=204314.msg1816147#msg1816147 date=1192093642]
Not dreaming to be a mod dude, I wouldnt mind being one, but im not going to get upset or anything if i dont.

I try my best not to flame, and i honestly do not like it. I wont make excuses, no one is perfect, and people get pissed sometimes. I admit i have before, but atleast i dont go all out like some people.

Ive seen people go so far,

STFU you fkn fkr, GTFO you fail at life, go kill yourself…

That’s suger coated.

I try dude =\

[/quote]Lol trust me, you don’t want to be one.
After you see pics ikiliki is posting randomly about reports and such your mind will change, too many people think it’s funny to be one, but nrlly.[/quote]
True, too many people think it’s ‘funny’, thats just fail.
Not saying you are thinking that hippie

Read full topic

No offence but rs w00dcut or whatever his name was and hippie are uber wannabe-mod imo
[/quote]
That hurts </3

Wanna be mods or not, idc what you call me. Atleast im trying to keep this comunity alive, What do you think if there were no mods, this fourum would be chaos. So, Hush :)[/quote]

You may be keeping it alive, but not in a good way. I see a lot of un-relevant posts, spam, and flaming. Think about that before dreaming of being a mod.

item.title: The main reason this site is so spammy, and what you can do about it
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

Huh? Polls to vote if someone may become mod? No thanks, too many multiple accounts.
We just keep that under the staff.

[quote=“hippie, post:54, topic:149032”][quote author=God of Ikiliki link=topic=204314.msg1811390#msg1811390 date=1191876356]

There are too many wannabe-mods thinking they can handle modding and thinking it is fun like having your own smfforfree site to abuse on people.
[/quote]I 100% agree with that.
Even people ask me if they may become mod 'Plz can I be mod here, I have my own site: *.smfforfree3.com so I know how to ban people which I don’t like.
Actually they can’t ban lol

I agree also. But, some people have what it takes to be a mod, weather your powers are to mute, and moderate, or just locking. It still would help would it not?[/quote]
Only locking or deleting helps.
But if they keep reposting it it will annoy you, no spare time.
Thats why I feel so happy about the Nusquam spell

Read full topic

Agreed, but that being said the chances of a new mod are little (unless you guys have polls on it or something). Besides it takes a good community along with a good staff to keep a community like this from dieing.

Highly agreed. That has kept this community alive for as long as it has, but it isnt enough anymore, many people just dont care, they just want to be dumb asses.
I mean look at Ikiliki’s and my short convo about MITB people like gikid.
Those are the people who destroy comunitys.

item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

[quote=“jua, post:50, topic:149032”]Iki, your a Moparscape Moderator and you can ban?
Wow your cheating.[/quote]Read this carefully:

When cast effectively, Nusquam kills instantaneously, producing a blinding flash of green light but leaving no mark on the victim's body. There is no way to block or counter the Curse, and the only person that ever survived it is God of Ikiliki. Nusquam is one of the three Unforgivable Curses in the 'I Don't Know Kingdom'. If the caster is not strong enough to cast it and fails it will give the target extra random powers.

Yes some mage used it on me.
And boom, but no cheating.

Read full topic

item.title: The main reason this site is so spammy, and what you can do about it
item.dc:creator: @jua jua
item.description:
@jua wrote:

[quote=“Tico135, post:46, topic:149032”][quote author=jua link=topic=204314.msg1811287#msg1811287 date=1191873757]
Wouldn’t work.
First I wanted to become a mod also, until Iki showed me a short vid of the reports.
Moparscape Mods don’t have many powers, they can only Lock/Delete and move.
You will get tired when people repost it every time you lock it.
Iki does it great on his own lol.
Sure something like Mrq will happen
[/quote]

You can never be ‘sure’ something like Mrquarter will happen again because you don’t know. People are different and may not act the same as Mrquarter did, the hard thing is, people change when they become moderator’s. That can be a good thing, and yet a bad thing. That is why I am sure they haven’t chosen another moderator. Because they are eying a few member’s and possibly monitoring the posts and seeing if they can interperte how they may act if they became a moderator.

Yes, that hatred against mscp on mitb is insane. Almost every single member on mitb, hates mscp. They make fun of us for knowing server java, and I ask them, what other programming language do you know? As iker’s already know’s, io9 loves to come here and be an asshole. He has warned him before and I am sure he will do it again, as well as the other moparisthebestians that choose to come here.[/quote]
True, however I don’t trust it anymore.
There are too many wannabe-mods thinking they can handle modding and thinking it is fun like having your own smfforfree site to abuse on people.

Read full topic
